Involvement in Freestyle Scootering Industry

Professional Rider and Cinematographer

My first introduction to freestyle scootering was a YouTube video I stumbled upon at the age of 11. The video was of professional scooter rider Coedie Donovan performing tricks I didnâ€™t even think were possible. Since then, I have taken a head-first dive into the rapidly growing sport of scootering and developed a passion for the extreme. After 11 years of riding, I have risen to the rank of professional and currently hold 4 sponsors. Through my involvement, along with all the countless sprains, bruises and broken bones, I have developed a skill for cinematography that has allowed me to work within the industry, creating videos and promotional content for various companies.
